data.name: VR Hentai Hot
data.detailed_description:
Game Introduction:
You can fully enjoy the most luxurious sexual services offered by beautiful ladies. It is so realistic that it feels as if you are actually doing it.

Game Explanation:
A luxury VR brothel that makes sure that every detail, whether it is the beautiful, sexy ladies, the gorgeous rooms that are dedicated to sex, or the sound effects, fits the hentai genre.
You can enjoy the best immersive experience that is so realistic and vivid that you can almost feel the warmth of their breath.

Controls:
You can move where you want and play by having sex. Controls are available by touching the diamond.
You can customize the beautiful ladies and their outfits. You can enjoy having sex with your types of girls.

English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Ukrainian*, Dutch*, Greek*, Swedish*, Thai*, Czech*, Danish*, Turkish*, Norwegian*, Hungarian*, Finnish*, Bulgarian*, Vietnamese*, Portuguese*, Polish*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Japanese*, Korean*

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
